import React from 'react'; import ReactDOM from 'react-dom'; import Modal from 'react-bootstrap/Modal'; import Button from 'react-bootstrap/Button'; // import "../General/Cards/Cards.js"; // import "../General/Cards/Cards.css"; // import "../Parts/Header/Header.js"; // import "../Parts/Header/Header.css"; // import "../Parts/Footer/Footer.js"; // import "../Parts/Footer/Footer.css"; import Header from '../../Parts/Header/Header' import ContactUsCard from '../../General/Cards/ContactUsCard' import ContactJSON from '../../../Json/ContactUs' import './ContactUs.css' class ContactUs extends React.Component { render(){ const ContactUsCards= ContactJSON.map((jsonItem) => ); return(

Welcome

We are looking forward to help you create the house of your dreams

{ContactUsCards}

Thanks for your patience

); // } } export default ContactUs;
